mean_cn: v. （scale的过去式和过去分词）刮去鳞片；  adj. 有鳞的，（房屋）栉比鳞次的，已去了鳞的
mean_en: having the body covered or partially covered with thin horny plates, as some fish and reptiles
word_etyma: scale鳞 + d形容词后缀 → scaled 有鳞的
sentence: Most fish are scaled, so you have to prepare them before you can cook them.
sentence_trans: 大多数鱼都是有鳞的，所以你必须在烹调它们之前处理一下。
